title: The Glass Tomb (1955 Mystery) with John Ireland, Honor Blackman - Director: Montgomery Tully

sources.title: The Glass Tomb (1955 Mystery) with John Ireland, Honor Blackman - Director: Montgomery Tully
sources.description:
Duo Movie with :
00:00 Black & White version of The Glass Tomb 
58:58 Colorized version of The Glass Tomb / The Glass Cage 

The Glass Tomb is a 1955 British mystery film, directed by Montgomery Tull. The screenplay by Richard H. Landau, is based on the 1945 novel The Outsiders (a.k.a. Common People) by A. E. Martin.

Summary:

Showman Pel Pelham stages a sensational act featuring “Sapolio,” who attempts the world’s longest fast in a glass cage. However, the performance is overshadowed by a blackmail scheme from Rena, an old friend’s former lover, who turns up dead at a party, making Pel’s friend Tony the prime suspect. As Pel races to uncover the truth, he navigates a deadly maze of murder, a shocking poisoning, and a climactic showdown with the real killer!


Main Actors:

John Ireland as Pel Pelham
Honor Blackman as Jenny Pelham
Geoffrey Keen as Harry Stanton
Eric Pohlmann as Henri Sapolio
Sid James as Tony Lewis
Liam Redmond as Inspector Lindley
Sydney Tafler as Rorke
Sam Kydd as George
Ferdy Mayne as Bertie
